pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Lmo![GitHub Workflow Status (with branch)](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jorenham/lmo/CI.yml?branch=master&style=flat-square)[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/lmo?style=flat-square)](https://pypi.org/project/lmo/)[![versions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/lmo?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/jorenham/lmo)[![license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/jorenham/lmo?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/jorenham/lmo/blob/master/LICENSE?)Generalized trimmed **L-mo**ments for robust statistics. ---See the [documentation](https://jorenham.github.io/lmo/) for usage examples and code reference.
